channel.title: Mangalam Placement
channel.description: Jobs in Company Secretary, Legal, Finance & HR Advisory

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] //** set nounce **//
[session_ticket.create o.set='module.ticket_id'/]
[modules.run cookies ticket_id='{module.ticket_id}' /]
[arr.create o.set="template.fb"] [status]success[/status] [ticket_id][module.get ticket_id /][/ticket_id] [url][aw2.get app.path /]/t/[module.get ticket_id /][/url] [/arr.create] [session_ticket.set_activity {module.ticket_id} collection='{module.collection}' module='redirect' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='app_id' value='{module.app_id}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='app_secret' value='{module.app_secret}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='app_path' value='{app.path}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='scope' value='{module.scope}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='run_after_login' value='{module.run_after_login}' c.not_empty='{module.run_after_login}'/] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='redirect_to' value='{module.redirect_to}' not_empty='{module.redirect_to}'/] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='provider' value='facebook'/]
[template.return template.fb /] [/templates.add]

item.title: redirect
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[session_ticket.get {app.active.ticket} o.set='module.ses_ticket' /] [facebook.login_url app_id='{module.ses_ticket.app_id}' app_secret='{module.ses_ticket.app_secret}' ticket_id='{app.active.ticket}' o.set='module.fb_url'/] [session_ticket.set_activity {app.active.ticket} collection='{module.collection}' module='auth' /] [session_ticket.set {app.active.ticket} field='redirect_to' value='{request.redirect_to}' not_empty='{request.redirect_to}'/]
[php.wp_redirect p1='{module.fb_url}' /] [/templates.add]

item.title: Auth
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[session_ticket.get {app.active.ticket} o.set='module.ses_ticket' /] [facebook.auth app_id='{module.ses_ticket.app_id}' app_secret='{module.ses_ticket.app_secret}' ticket_id='{app.active.ticket}' o.set='template.user_data.raw'/]
[template.set user_data.full_name="{template.user_data.raw.name}" /] [template.set user_data.first_name="{template.user_data.raw.first_name}" /] [template.set user_data.last_name="{template.user_data.raw.last_name}" /] [template.set user_data.email="{template.user_data.raw.email}" /] [template.set user_data.identifier="{template.user_data.raw.id}" /] [template.set user_data.picture_url="{template.user_data.raw.picture.url}" /]
[session_ticket.set {app.active.ticket} field='user_data' value='{template.user_data.json_encode}' /]
[php.wp_redirect p1='{module.ses_ticket.redirect_to}/?t={app.active.ticket}'/]
[/templates.add]
